QuestData.Title: Troggzor the Earthinator
QuestData.Description: You have to put an end to this now!$B$BGo back northwest onto the front and kill their battle leader, Troggzor the Earthinator. Bring me his cudgel as proof.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Stop him before he earthinates the countryside!
QuestData.CompletionText: Is he dead? Do you have the cudgel?
QuestData.RewardText: <Gravel solemnly nods his head.>$B$BFinally, we can move forward and rescue the Stonefather.
